name: Placeholder name (Escada Games, Sucraiso)
description:
Placeholder Name Yeah, that's the game's name Made for the Godot Wild Jam #31
  • Software:
    • Godot Engine 3.2.2 Stable Official;
    • Libresprite 1.0-dev;
  • Assets:
    • Palette: https://coolors.co/dfbbb1-f56476-e43f6f-be3e82-5e4352;
    • Footsteps SFX: Kenney's Impact Sounds;
    • BG Noises: Forest Ambiance, by Tiny Worlds;
    • BG Music: 8-bit Forest Theme by Wolfgang;
    • Tree and grass sprites: Canary Games' 1-bit topdown asset pack;
    • Player sprite: This one I managed to make myself :)
  • Source code:
    • It's available on our GitHub!
